column4: i just installed ubuntu 11.10 dual boot and would like someone to help me increase the disk space available to ubuntu.  i still have 50 gigs left but it wont use them. any help?  i've looked around and UTFSE but i cant find any of the menus discussed
using gparted live cd , or ubuntu live cd
i installed gparted via the terminal but i'm a bit new to this.  if i want to use the ubuntu cd, do i need to boot from it?
you have to boot from a live cd, yes
